gear.author: Yaroslav O. Halchenko

segmentation_image.description: A segmentation image must be supplied labeling the gray and white matters. Default values = 2 and 3, respectively.

warped_white_matter.description: Filename for the warped white matter file.

gray_matter_prob_image.description: In addition to the segmentation image, a gray matter probability image can be used. If no such image is supplied, one is created using the segmentation image and a variance of 1.0 mm.

thickness_prior_image.description: An image containing spatially varying prior thickness values.

white_matter_prob_image.description: In addition to the segmentation image, a white matter probability image can be used. If no such image is supplied, one is created using the segmentation image and a variance of 1.0 mm.

cortical_thickness.description: A thickness map defined in the segmented gray matter.

gear.name: nipype-interfaces-ants-segmentation-kellykapowski
gear.description: Nipype Interface to ANTs' KellyKapowski, also known as DiReCT.
gear.label: KellyKapowski

use_bspline_smoothing.description: Sets the option for B-spline smoothing of the velocity field.

smoothing_velocity_field.description: Defines the Gaussian smoothing of the velocity field (default = 1.5). If the b-spline smoothing option is chosen, then this defines the isotropic mesh spacing for the smoothing spline (default = 15). [default=1.5]

gray_matter_label.description: The label value for the gray matter label in the segmentation_image. [default=2]

convergence.description: Convergence is determined by fitting a line to the normalized energy profile of the last N iterations (where N is specified by the window size) and determining the slope which is then compared with the convergence threshold.

smoothing_variance.description: Defines the Gaussian smoothing of the hit and total images. [default=1.0]

white_matter_label.description: The label value for the white matter label in the segmentation_image. [default=3]

max_invert_displacement_field_iters.description: Maximum number of iterations for estimating the invertdisplacement field. [default=20]

number_integration_points.description: Number of compositions of the diffeomorphism per iteration. [default=10]

gradient_step.description: Gradient step size for the optimization. [default=0.025]

num_threads.description: Number of ITK threads to use [default=1]

thickness_prior_estimate.description: Provides a prior constraint on the final thickness measurement in mm. [default=10]
